```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

rm(list = ls())

```

```{r}

library(synapser)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}

synLogin()

fileEntity <- synGet("syn28544692")

print(fileEntity)

```
```{r}

table <- read.csv(fileEntity$path)

table_edited <- table %>%
  mutate(Tissue = "DLPFC")

fileName <- "Final_Agora_DE_TMT.csv"

write.csv(table_edited, "Final_Agora_DE_TMT.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```


```{r}

file <- File(path = fileName, parent = "syn19275585")
file <- synStore(file)

```
